thread.title_full: Madhuri Dixit hypes ‘Tamma Tamma Again’ and Alia Bhatt can’t help gushing | Hindi Movie News - Times of India

title: Madhuri Dixit hypes ‘Tamma Tamma Again’ and Alia Bhatt can’t help gushing | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text: Emotional Anil Kapoor breaks down at 'Mirzya' music launch event Madhuri Dixit hypes ‘Tamma Tamma Again’ and Alia Bhatt can’t help gushing In a recent video, Madhuri appears along with Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan to inform the fans of the song’s release date. TNN | Feb 10, 2017, 04.25 AM IST Right from the film's first trailer, 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania' has been teasing us with bits from a revamped version of the 1990 chartbuster - 'Tamma Tamma' from 'Thanedaar'. The film's title track was recently released and has created quite a buzz around it. ‘Badrinath Ki Dulhania’ title track: Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan present the ultimate Holi number The colourful title track of ‘Badrinath Ki Dulhania’ is out and will make you wait impatiently for the festival of colours, Holi. The makers are about to come out with their own rendition of the classic song, which boasted of Madhuri Dixit 's splendid moves and Sanjay Dutt putting his best dancing foot forward. In a recent video, Madhuri appears along with Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan to inform the fans of the song's release date. Alia Bhatt shared the video on her Twitter page and captioned it, "Hear it first from the dancing queen herself @MadhuriDixit 2 days to go for #TammaTammaAgain @Varun_dvn!!!! 😀❤️❤️❤️" Hear it first from the dancing queen herself @MadhuriDixit 2 days to go for #TammaTammaAgain @Varun_dvn !!!! 😀❤️❤️❤️ pic.twitter.com/4iT3w9PrcX — Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) February 9, 2017 The 'Udta Punjab' actress can barely contain her excitement at receiving Madhuri's blessings.
